label: Lamps and Lighting
description: Products and accessories related to indoor lighting, including lamps, shades, and bulbs.
intents: Find a lamp for my bedroom
Buy a floor lamp for my living room

subcategories.label: Table Lamps
subcategories.description: Lamps designed to sit on a table or desk.

subcategories.label: Floor Lamps
subcategories.description: Lamps designed to stand on the floor.

subcategories.label: Lamp Shades
subcategories.description: Accessories that cover and diffuse the light from a lamp.

subcategories.label: Bulbs
subcategories.description: Light bulbs of various types and sizes.

subcategories.label: Specialty Lamps
subcategories.description: Lamps designed for specific purposes or styles.
